duties_responsibilities.duty: Shadow and assist technicians with equipment repairs.
Assist with parts department and showroom operations.
Perform building and yard maintenance and equipment cleaning.
Adhere to academic policies and regulations.
Follow safety rules and regulations while performing work assignments.
Conduct self in a professional manner in the presence of customers and community.
Proactively seek and participate in available company-sponsored training.
Participate in company/location driven communication efforts.
Maintain a positive and professional working relationship with peers and management.
